hero.title: Own Your Future, One Asset at a Time
hero.text: G'Asset Co. empowers entrepreneurs and families in Douala with affordable hire-purchase solutions. Start your business or improve your home today — no large upfront payment required.

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Empowering Dreams Through Accessible Financing
about.text1: G'Asset Co. was founded with a simple mission: to make essential assets accessible to everyone in Cameroon, regardless of their financial starting point.
about.text2: We believe that owning the right equipment — whether it's a sewing machine to start a tailoring business, or a refrigerator for your family — should not be a distant dream. Our hire-purchase model breaks down financial barriers, allowing you to pay in manageable installments while immediately benefiting from the asset.

mission.subtitle: Our Mission
mission.title: Building Prosperity, One Asset at a Time
mission.text: We exist to bridge the gap between aspiration and achievement. By providing flexible financing solutions, we help individuals and small businesses acquire the tools they need to thrive.

vision.subtitle: Our Vision
vision.title: A Cameroon Where Everyone Can Build Their Future
vision.text: We envision a society where financial constraints no longer hold back talented entrepreneurs and hardworking families from achieving their goals.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: Clear pricing, no hidden fees. You always know exactly what you're paying for.

socialImpact.title: Social Impact
socialImpact.text: Every asset we finance creates opportunity — for individuals, families, and communities.

empowerment.title: Financial Empowerment
empowerment.text: We give you the tools to build wealth and independence, one step at a time.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.text: We keep our promises and treat every customer with fairness and respect.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We continuously improve our services to better serve your needs.

assets.subtitle: Our Asset Catalog
assets.title: Quality Equipment for Your Success
assets.text: Browse our selection of carefully curated assets. Each one is designed to help you start or grow your business, or improve your daily life.

iceCreamMachine.description: Professional soft-serve machine perfect for starting your frozen treats business. High capacity and easy to operate.

howItWorks.subtitle: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Four Simple Steps to Ownership
howItWorks.text: Our process is designed to be straightforward and transparent. No complicated paperwork, no hidden surprises.

step1.title: Browse & Choose
step1.text: Explore our catalog and select the asset that matches your needs and goals.

step2.title: Apply & Get Approved
step2.text: Fill out a simple application. We'll review it quickly and get back to you within 24 hours.

step3.title: Receive Your Asset
step3.text: Once approved, we deliver your asset directly to you. Start using it immediately.

step4.title: Pay & Own
step4.text: Make weekly or monthly payments that fit your budget. Once complete, the asset is 100% yours.

benefits.title: Why Choose Hire-Purchase?
benefits.benefit2: Start earning with your asset immediately

testimonial2.quote: The ice cream machine changed everything for me. I couldn't afford it outright, but the hire-purchase plan made it possible. Now I sell 200+ cones daily!

testimonial3.quote: Professional, transparent, and truly helpful. They worked with me to find a payment plan that fit my family's budget. I recommend them to everyone.
testimonial3.name: Aïssatou Mbarga
